Title: Valid Email Sign Up
Steps: Enter valid email address | Enter password meeting criteria | Enter mobile number | Request OTP | Enter OTP for verification | Submit sign up form
Expected: User should be successfully registered and redirected to the welcome page

Title: Invalid Email Sign Up
Steps: Enter an invalid email address | Enter password meeting criteria | Enter mobile number | Request OTP | Submit sign up form
Expected: An error message should be displayed and the user should not be registered

Title: Existing Email Sign Up
Steps: Enter an email address already in use | Enter password meeting criteria | Enter mobile number | Request OTP | Submit sign up form
Expected: An error message should be displayed and the user should not be registered

Title: Password Criteria Violation
Steps: Enter a password with less than 8 characters | Enter a password without an uppercase letter | Enter a password without a number | Enter a password without a special character
Expected: An error message should be displayed and the user should not be able to proceed

Title: OTP Verification Failure
Steps: Enter incorrect OTP | Submit OTP for verification
Expected: An error message should be displayed and the user should not be registered

Title: Successful Redirection After Sign Up
Expected: User should be redirected to the welcome page

Title: Mobile Number Validation
Steps: Enter an invalid mobile number | Request OTP
Expected: An error message should be displayed and the user should not receive the OTP

Title: Sign Up with Only Email
Steps: Enter email address | Submit sign up form without entering mobile number or password
Expected: An error message should be displayed and the user should not be able to proceed
